text: tum kya achchhe giroh ho ki (logon kee) hidaayat ke vaaste paida kiye gae ho tum (logon ko) achchhe kaam ka hukm karate ho aur bure kaamon se rokate ho aur khuda par eemaan rakhate ho aur agar ahale kitaab bhee (isee tarah) eemaan laate to unake haq mein bahut achchha hota unamen se kuchh hee to eemaanadaar hain aur aksar badakaar
